events.message: I recently purchased a pair of headphones but would like to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer request and keywords identified in the message.
A support agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case and assist the customer with their request.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I am here to assist you with your refund request for the headphones you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and reason for the refund so we can process your request smoothly?
My order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the headphones sound tinny and have poor audio quality.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate your refund immediately once we receive the returned headphones via our pre-paid shipping label.
That sounds good. Please send the shipping label and instructions on how to return the item.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label and return instructions. Once the product is received, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have returned the headphones and that your refund is being processed as expected.
Your refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you need further assistance.
